document.full_text: a former alliancebernstein holding lp brokerage worker has been charged with stealing software the company used to transmit messages containing data about customers and transactions, manhattan district attorney cyrus vance said on wednesday.
document.title: ex-alliancebernstein worker in ny charged in theft
lines_and_colors: a former alliancebernstein holding lp brokerage worker has been charged with stealing software the company used to transmit messages containing data about customers and transactions, manhattan district attorney cyrus vance said on wednesday.
